content.rendered:
2023 Final Four Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including four nights hotel stay, entry level tickets to both semis and the final, and more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackagePackages From
Embassy Suites by Hilton Houston Galleria$2,125
Hyatt Regency Houston Galleria$2,375
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until three months prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
